title: Any building with mixed occupancies with any of the aforesaid occupancies in (ii) above with built-up area 500 sq
clause_text: Any building with mixed occupancies with any of the aforesaid occupancies in (ii) above with built-up area 500 sq.m. or more on any floor irrespective of height of such building. xv) Yatri Niwas means a building used for accommodation of tourist, traveller etc.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Any building with mixed occupancies with any of the aforesaid occupancies in (ii) above with built-up area 500 sq.m. or more on any floor irrespective of height of such building.
